publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1355.3 Ms Margaret Curran: Housing Stock Transfer-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1355) in the name of Fiona Hyslop, leave out from "notes" to end and insert "supports the community ownership policies that the Scottish Executive is taking forward to attract significant new investment into housing and supports putting tenants at the heart of the decision making process relating to their homes, in line with its commitments in Partnership for Scotland and Programme for Government." Supported by: Jackie Baillie*
